task.title: How to Divide Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here are instructions for using the division feature of the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully divide one number by another, you must be familiar with the arithmetic process of division.
taskbody.result: The result of the division is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to divide 6 by 2. The equation looks like this: 6 รท 2 = 3. You enter 6, press the divide button, enter 2, and press the equals button. The result 3 appears on the screen.
